name: rexlimdvw
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), w2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s0, w2)
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

comment: Inference from Theorem 19.23 of [Margaris] p. 90 (restricted quantifier version). (Contributed by NM, 18-Jun-2014.)
